org.glite.authz.pep.profile
Interface AuthorizationProfile

All Superinterfaces:
Profile
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAuthorizationProfile, CommonXACMLAuthorizationProfile, GridCEAuthorizationProfile, GridWNAuthorizationProfile
public interface AuthorizationProfile
extends Profile

Authorization Profile Interface. Basic functionalities.

Method Summary

          Creates an Action containing the action-id Attribute with the value given as parameter.

createRequest

Request createRequest(Subject subject,
                      Resource resource,
                      Action action)
Creates a Request containing the given Subject, Resource and Action. The Environment with the profile identifier is added to it.

Parameters:
subject - the request subject
resource - the request resource
action - the request action
Returns:
the request
See Also:
createRequest(Subject, Resource, Action, Environment), createEnvironmentProfileId(String), Profile.getProfileId()

getObligation

Obligation getObligation(Response response,
                         int decision,
                         String obligationId)
                         throws ProfileException
Gets the obligation identified by id from the response for a given decision.

Parameters:
response - the response to process
decision - the decision to match
obligationId - the obligation id to match
Returns:
the matching obligation
Throws:
ProfileException - if the response doesn't contain the result for the decision, or obligation matching the id.

createEnvironmentProfileId

Environment createEnvironmentProfileId(String profileId)
Creates a base Environment containing the profile-id Attribute with the profile identifier

Parameters:
profileId - the profile ID value
Returns:
the environment

createRequest

Request createRequest(X509Certificate[] certs,
                      String resourceId,
                      String actionId)
                      throws ProfileException
Creates a Request with the given end entity X.509 certificate or proxy (with its chain), the resource-id and the action-id.

Parameters:
certs - the user X.5099 certificate or proxy, with its chain
resourceId - the resource id
actionId - the action id
Returns:
a new request
Throws:
ProfileException - if the a certificate can not be read
See Also:
createSubjectKeyInfo(X509Certificate[]), createResourceId(String), createActionId(String), createRequest(Subject, Resource, Action)

Returns:

Throws:

getObligationPosixMapping

Obligation getObligationPosixMapping(Response response)
                                     throws ProfileException
Gets the posix env map Obligation from the result with a Permit decision

Parameters:
response - the response to process
Returns:
the POSIX mapping obligation, with decision Permit
Throws:
ProfileException - if no decision Permit or no POSIX mapping obligation is found.

getAttributeAssignmentUserId

String getAttributeAssignmentUserId(Obligation posixMappingObligation)
                                    throws ProfileException
Gets the mandatory POSIX user-id (login name) from the posix env map Obligation

Parameters:
posixMappingObligation - the posix mapping obligation
Returns:
the POSIX login name to map
Throws:
ProfileException - if the obligation is not a posix env map , or if the mandatory user-id attribute assignment is not contained in the obligation, or if the user-id login name is empty or null.

getAttributeAssignmentGroupIds

List<String> getAttributeAssignmentGroupIds(Obligation posixMappingObligation)
                                            throws ProfileException
Gets the list of POSIX group-ids (group names) from the posix env map Obligation

Parameters:
posixMappingObligation - the posix mapping obligation
Returns:
list of POSIX group names, can be empty if the group-id attribute assignments are not contained in the obligation.
Throws:
ProfileException - if the obligation is not a posix env map

getAttributeAssignmentPrimaryGroupId

String getAttributeAssignmentPrimaryGroupId(Obligation posixMappingObligation)
                                            throws ProfileException
Gets the POSIX primary group-id (group name) from the posix env map Obligation

Parameters:
posixMappingObligation - the posix mapping obligation
Returns:
the POSIX group name, can be null if the attribute is not contained in the obligation.
Throws:
ProfileException - if the obligation is not a posix env map
